content: off all sts ________________________________________________________________________ finishing weave in the ends and block your sock serenityxknits 6 knitting in serenity ________________________________________________________________________ ruffled hem - illustration using the stripe in the contrast color as your guide count down 5 row the purl bumps are highlighted in the picture use these bumps as your guide when picking up sts for the ruffled hem insert your needle into each bump and pick up the given number of sts in the pattern once all sts are picked up they should look like shown in the picture now you can continue to work the ruffled hem the ruffled hem in progress don t be concerned if it doesn t resemble a ruffle during the increase rounds the ruffled hem will only reveal itself after the final bind off at the end serenityxknits 7 knitting in serenity
